title: Tired of being a graphic designer? Try this!
content:
[http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk\_news/wales/south\_west/6286037.stm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905092234/http:/news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/wales/south_west/6286037.stm "http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk\_news/wales/south\_west/6286037.stm")

And he’s got no inclination to go back to a 9-5 gig either. ;-)

author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content:
At least he is certainly no CheapScate—he does much of his rolling for charity :-)

ChrisL
